price: 56. Mpe kundola Idrís(2) okati ya buku. Ya soló azalaki ntoma mpe moto ya bosembo.
arabic: وَٱذۡكُرۡ فِي ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ إِدۡرِيسَۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ صِدِّيقٗا نَّبِيّٗا

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wa-udh'kur fī al-kitābi id'rīsa innahu kāna ṣiddīqan nabiyyan
